title: Nominations Sent to the Senate, 3/4/2009 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




March 04, 2009

 



Nominations Sent to the Senate, 3/4/2009




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  _______________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release   March 4, 2009 NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE: John Berry, of the District of Columbia, to be Director of the Office of Personnel Management for a term of four years, vice Linda M. Springer, resigned. Ronald C. Sims, of Washington, to be Deputy Secretary of Housing and Urban Development, vice Romolo A. Bernardi, resigned. # # #
